author: Albert Ferrell

review: Ordered the Fire TV as soon as it became available.  I also own an Apple TV version 2 which is jailbroken and has XBMC installed. The Fire TV is android and thus allows you to sideload various apps.  I was able to sideload XBMC and after trying a couple of versions it seems that 12.3 works the best for me. If you have an Android phone you can sideload apps very easily with a few free apps such as ES File Explorer and JS Terminial.  Google this for instructions. Since the box has only been only out a few weeks give it time before the devs start to really make this operate at its full potential. Obtaining root will also probably be available but I doubt if most users would use it. It is rumored that Apple will be soon offering a new Apple TV but who knows if it will be able to be jailbroken.  Their latest one isn't and its been a couple of years. I don't game so I can't comment on its gaming ability. Use it for entertainment.  Prime works flawlessly and use it for Pandora, Hulu, and Tunedin radio plus the before mentioned XBMC.  With its processor the response is fast.Overall for my useage I am very happy with it and over time its capabilities will only get better. Would actually give this 4.5 stars.

author: fred j.

review: Let me preface this review by saying, I already own an xbox one and a ps4.  I picked this up knowing that it does the same things that both of them do, but I'm a tech nerd and need to have every device.This device is definitely not as powerful as either of the current consoles, but at $99 its the best value of the 3 options.  The streaming services are unbelievable, and the best feature is the voice search.  Say "Chuck Norris" into the remote, which has probably the best speech recognition I've seen to date, and instantly receive a list of all of his titles.  Great gift for a non tech savvy parent who you want to give access to the video streaming to.  There's even a great little 4 minute video tutorial on how to use the device for first time users.  My mom, who can't figure out how to text message on her HTC is already using this with ease.  The best part, is the voice recognition is stored and improved via the cloud, so your future amazon device purchases will benefit from your time talking into the remote of the firetv.  I give this 5 stars.
